name: Creative Destruction
description: Welcome to the world of Creative Destruction where everything is fully destructible! Creative Destruction is a new FPS/TPS sandbox survival game that features the utmost fun of building and firing.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core I3-4160 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core I5-6500 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 5 GB available space
